message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  This offer won't be as good in future rounds.
Let's split things a bit more fairly this time, Alice.  Time is money, after all.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your potential gains even further!
Okay, Bob.  Let's split it down the middle and be done with this.
